description: This file initializes core database objects for a LinkedIn Message Search system, including extension setups, tables for user profiles, LinkedIn connections, conversations, messages, message chunks for vector search, synchronization state, and related triggers and functions.

methods.name: public.set_updated_at
methods.description: Timestamp trigger function to update 'updated_at' on table row updates.

methods.name: public.handle_new_user
methods.description: Trigger function to automatically create or update user profile record upon new user creation.

methods.name: public.match_message_chunks
methods.description: Function to perform per-user similarity search over message chunks based on vector embeddings.
